Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. It comes with a variety of features that cater to your needs, ensuring both functionality and efficiency. Given its exceptional quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $85. This price reflects my desire to make this incredible opportunity accessible while still allowing me to recoup the investment made into creating such a valuable item. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
